column5: Hey guys,  I haven't posted a report in a LONG time but today i thought to end off the season with a little one.  With the Bass season about to close, me and my bro headed to simcoe one last time to attempt to catch some fat bass.  First drift was a success and we managed about 6 total for 4 hours.. Not bad... Lucky to enjoy simcoe on a relatively calm day.  WATER TEMPS were 41 !!
Gotta love those Smallies. LB for LB, the best action on the water
Clearly, you haven't caught many specks  S.
Never caught a trout of any kind actually.Wouldn`t know how to fish one if my life depended on it
Interesting how the white marks on the cheeks are very pronounced.  to the size of the fish.
When I read the title I figured you meant the bass in the tank at Bass Pro.  Couldn't figure out why they'd be so hard to find.   Nice tank bass.
